title: Steel concrete reinforcing bars - production in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million metric tons, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2003 to 2000.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2007 to 2005.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2005 to 2003.
gold: The statistic illustrates the volume of concrete reinforcing bars that were produced in the United States between 2000 and 2017 . In 2017 , some 6.4 million metric tons of such products were produced here .
